words.source: H1121 conj. waw + noun common masculine plural construct of בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'the sons of', ESV 'the sons of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3324 (יִצְהָר, 'Izhar'), proper noun masculine; KJV 'Izhar', ESV 'Izhar', NASB 'Izhar'
H7141 (קֹרַח, 'Korah'), proper noun masculine; KJV 'Korah', ESV 'Korah', NASB 'Korah'
H5298 conj. waw + proper noun masculine (נֶפֶג, 'Nepheg'); KJV 'Nepheg', ESV 'Nepheg', NASB 'Nepheg'
H2147 conj. waw + proper noun masculine (זִכְרִי, 'Zichri'); KJV 'Zichri', ESV 'Zichri', NASB 'Zichri'
